content:
TextAntiAliasingQuality Enum

Definition

Specifies the quality of the anti-aliasing to be used with the stem.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.TextAntiAliasingQuality* property.

In this Article

public enum TextAntiAliasingQuality
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
TextAntiAliasingQuality

Remarks

The TextAntiAliasingQuality enumeration represents the quality ranges for the text.

When you set a higher value for text anti-aliasing, the chart load increases and the performance is decreased. If your chart contains significant amounts of text, consider setting text anti-aliasing to a lower value.

Fields

High

High anti-aliasing quality.
Normal

Normal anti-aliasing quality.
SystemDefault

System default anti-aliasing quality. The text will be drawn using whatever font smoothing settings the user has selected for the system.
